name: Improved Youtube Style
description:
[DISCONTINUED]
Displays Youtube new design in a more convenient and simple. There are little details that make it more comfortable surfing the site.
Content is centered as it was in the previous design. It is an experimental version that I used to learn CSS. I will be adding improvements. If you see any bug, please report it to me.

Best regards & thanks for download!


XKZ

Tags: centered, improved, layout, new, cool, fixed, simple, clean, old, new
additional_info: ->v1.3.3 [MAR-31-2013]: + Fixed medium size video container - [1 bug not fixed yet] ->v1.3.2 [MAR-21-2013]: + Fixed video container - [1 bug not fixed yet] ->v1.3.1 [MAR-3-2013]: + Fixed background channels - [SOME BUGS ARE NOT SOLVED YET] ->v1.3 [MAR-2-2013]: == MAJOR UPDATE + Fixed some containers after Youtube update + Search centered + Footer centered + Band Link Color changed (only music videos) + Fixed medium size video to fill the space - [SOME BUGS ARE NOT SOLVED YET] ->v1.2.2 [JAN-28-2013]: + Centered inbox container ->v1.2.1 [JAN-19-2013]: + Fixed Search Bar in chrome ->v1.2 [JAN-10-2013]: == MAJOR UPDATE + Top bug solved (IMPORTANT) + Top reconstruction and centered to main content + Footer box created + Video details background now visible (fixed) + Some bars centered ->v1.1.1 [DEC-29-2012]: + More css elements forced to take effect + Red dislike bar ->v1.1 [DEC-15-2012]: + Top logo issue (now centered) + Some css elements forced to take effect ->BETA v1.0.1 [DEC-07-2012]: + Testing Responsive/Different resolutions ->BETA v1.0.0 [DEC-07-2012]: + Content centered + Top guide centered + Vote bar improved + Font size bigger + Border video title added + Search centered NOTE: PLEASE, DON'T COPY THIS CODE. IF YOU WANT TO USE IT IN YOUR OWN PROJECT, ASK ME BEFORE DOING IT. THANKS!
